terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.content: These terms of use govern your access to and use of the IrrigAIte UA Evapotranspiration Calculator. By using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.paragraph1: By accessing or using the IrrigAIte UA Evapotranspiration Calculator ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Service.
acceptance.paragraph2: We may update these Terms from time to time. Your continued use of the Service after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms. We will notify users of significant changes through email or prominent notice on our service.

services.title: 2. Description of Service
services.paragraph1: IrrigAIte UA provides an evapotranspiration calculator specifically designed for Ukrainian agricultural conditions. The Service includes:

features.pet: Potential evapotranspiration (PET) calculations using regional ML models
features.etc: Crop evapotranspiration (ETc) calculations based on FAO guidelines
features.irrigation: Irrigation recommendations based on soil moisture and crop requirements
features.map: Interactive map interface for region selection
features.history: Saving and retrieving user calculation history
features.license: License key activation and management for additional evaluations

usage.title: 3. Use of Service
usage.paragraph1: You may use our Service for lawful purposes related to agricultural planning and education. You agree to:

rules.accuracy: Provide accurate information when using the calculator and creating your account
rules.purpose: Use the Service only for its intended agricultural and educational purposes
rules.security: Maintain the security of your account credentials
rules.license: Use license keys responsibly and for individual use only (not for sharing or resale)
rules.interference: Not attempt to interfere with or disrupt the Service or its security measures
rules.legal: Not use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purposes
rules.ip: Respect the intellectual property rights of the Service
rules.reverse: Not attempt to reverse engineer or extract proprietary algorithms

userAccounts.title: 4. User Accounts and Data
userAccounts.paragraph1: To access certain features of the Service, you must create an account. You are responsible for:

responsibilities.confidentiality: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
responsibilities.activities: All activities that occur under your account
responsibilities.unauthorized: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
responsibilities.accuracy: Ensuring the accuracy of information you provide

userAccounts.paragraph2: We store your calculation history, user profile, and license key usage data to provide personalized services. You can manage and delete your data through your account settings or by contacting support.

licenseKeys.title: 5. License Keys and Evaluations
licenseKeys.paragraph1: License keys provide additional PET evaluations beyond the free tier. By purchasing and using license keys:

terms.activation: Each license key can only be activated once and is non-transferable
terms.individual: License keys are for individual use and may not be shared, resold, or distributed
terms.expiration: Evaluations do not expire but are consumed with each PET calculation
terms.fraud: We reserve the right to deactivate keys obtained through fraudulent means
terms.refunds: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis for unused evaluations
terms.support: License key purchases help support ongoing development and API costs

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties

importantDisclaimer.title: IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER:
importantDisclaimer.content: The calculations and recommendations provided by this Service are for informational purposes only. Actual irrigation decisions should consider local conditions, soil testing, weather patterns, and professional agricultural advice.

disclaimer.paragraph1: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.
disclaimer.paragraph2: We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or completely secure. Weather data, calculations, and stored information may contain inaccuracies or be subject to technical failures.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.paragraph1: In no event shall IrrigAIte UA, its operators, or contributors be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to:

damages.substitute: Cost of substitute goods or services
damages.access: Unauthorized access to or alteration of your data

liability.paragraph2: This limitation applies regardless of whether such damages arise from contract, tort, negligence, or any other legal theory, and even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

privacy.title: 8. Data and Privacy
privacy.paragraph1: We collect and process personal information as described in our Privacy Policy. Key points include:

points.accounts: User accounts are required for saving calculations and activating license keys
points.storage: We store your calculation history, user profile, and license key usage data
points.security: Data is stored securely using Supabase's infrastructure with Row Level Security
points.access: You can access, modify, and delete your data through your account
points.selling: We do not sell your personal information to third parties

privacy.paragraph2: For comprehensive details on data collection, storage, and processing, please refer to our

scientific.title: 9. Scientific Accuracy
scientific.paragraph1: While we strive for scientific accuracy using established methodologies, users should be aware that:

limitations.models: Calculations are based on mathematical models and may not account for all local factors
limitations.weather: Weather data accuracy depends on third-party sources (OpenWeatherMap API)
limitations.coefficients: Crop coefficients are based on standard FAO guidelines and may vary by cultivar
limitations.soil: Soil parameters should be verified through local testing when possible
limitations.validation: Results should be validated against local agricultural expertise and field observations
limitations.regional: Regional models are calibrated for Ukrainian conditions but may require local adjustments

intellectualProperty.title: 10. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: The Service, including its design, functionality, and content, is protected by intellectual property laws. The underlying agricultural formulas and FAO guidelines are based on publicly available scientific research.
intellectualProperty.paragraph2: You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on the Service without permission, except for personal agricultural use. The ML models and regional coefficients represent proprietary research and development.
intellectualProperty.paragraph3: You retain ownership of the agricultural data you input, but grant us a license to use it for providing and improving the Service.

availability.title: 11. Service Availability
availability.paragraph1: We strive to maintain high service availability, but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access:

conditions.maintenance: The Service may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance, updates, or technical issues
conditions.dependencies: Third-party dependencies (weather APIs, Supabase) may affect service availability
conditions.notice: We will provide reasonable notice for planned maintenance when possible
conditions.security: Your data remains secure during service interruptions

termination.title: 12. Termination
termination.paragraph1: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to the Service at any time, with or without prior notice, for any reason, including violation of these Terms. You may also terminate your account at any time.
termination.paragraph2: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately. We will retain your data according to our Privacy Policy and may provide you with an opportunity to export your data before permanent deletion.

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes arising from these Terms or the use of the Service shall be resolved through appropriate legal channels. We will make reasonable efforts to resolve disputes amicably before pursuing legal action.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.paragraph1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, need support with your account, or wish to report issues, please contact us through the appropriate channels provided on our website.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect and handle your information

commitment.title: Our Privacy Commitment
commitment.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of any information you provide while using the IrrigAIte UA calculator. We only collect data necessary to provide and improve our services.

userProvided.title: Information You Provide
userProvided.intro: When creating an account and using our calculator, you may provide:

items.account: Account Information: Email address and password (securely handled by Supabase authentication)
items.agricultural: Agricultural Data: Regional selection, crop types, planting dates, soil parameters, and irrigation settings
items.history: Calculation History: Your saved PET and irrigation calculations, including results and timestamps
items.license: License Key Data: License key activation records and evaluation usage tracking

userProvided.important: Important: This information is linked to your user account and stored securely in our Supabase database.

automaticallyCollected.title: Automatically Collected Information
automaticallyCollected.intro: We may automatically collect certain technical information:

items.weather: Fetch weather data for your region
items.history: Save and retrieve your calculation history

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.intro: Your data is stored securely using industry-standard practices:

items.persistent: User accounts, calculation history, and license key data are stored persistently in Supabase database
items.passwords: Passwords are not stored by our application - they are securely handled by Supabase's authentication service
items.agricultural: Agricultural data is associated with your user account for personalized service
items.weather: Weather data is cached temporarily for performance optimization
items.analytics: Usage statistics are anonymized and aggregated for analytics

security.title: Security Measures
security.intro: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data:

items.infrastructure: Supabase's robust security infrastructure and compliance standards
items.rls: Row Level Security (RLS) ensuring users can only access their own data

supabase.title: Supabase (Database and Authentication)
supabase.intro: We use Supabase as our primary backend service provider:

items.database: Database hosting for calculation history and user profiles
items.functions: Serverless functions (Edge Functions) for license key activation
items.processing: Your data is processed and stored by Supabase on our behalf
items.compliance: Supabase complies with industry security standards and regulations

weather.title: Weather Data Providers
weather.intro: We use third-party weather services to provide current temperature data:

items.api: OpenWeatherMap API for real-time temperature data
items.coordinates: Location coordinates are used only for weather station selection
items.privacy: No personal information is shared with weather providers

analytics.title: Analytics and Monitoring
analytics.content: We may use analytics tools to understand service usage and improve performance. All analytics data is anonymized and does not contain personal information.

essential.title: Essential Cookies and Session Management
essential.intro: Our service uses essential cookies and session storage for functionality:
essential.note: We do not use tracking cookies or third-party advertising cookies.

noSelling.title: No Data Selling
noSelling.intro: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties for commercial purposes.
noSelling.limited: Information may only be shared in the following limited circumstances:

items.protection: Protection of our rights and property
items.providers: With service providers (like Supabase) who assist in operating our service

access.title: Access and Control
access.intro: You have the following rights regarding your stored data:

items.access: Access: View your calculation history through the "My Calculations" page
items.delete: Delete: Remove individual calculations or your entire account
items.correct: Correct: Update your account information and preferences
items.export: Export: Request a copy of your data by contacting support
items.control: Control: Manage your privacy settings and data sharing preferences

portability.title: Data Portability and Deletion
portability.intro: You can exercise your data rights through:

items.support: Contacting support for data export requests

childrenPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our service is not directed at children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us immediately and we will take steps to remove it.

dataRetention.title: 9. Data Retention
dataRetention.intro: We retain your data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services:

items.account: Account data: Retained until account deletion
items.calculations: Calculation history: Retained until manually deleted or account deletion
items.license: License key records: Retained for audit and support purposes
items.analytics: Analytics data: Anonymized and retained for service improvement

policyChanges.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.updates: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
policyChanges.notification: We will notify users of significant changes through email or prominent notice on our service. Continued use of the service after policy changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 11. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, our privacy practices, or wish to exercise your data rights, please contact us through the appropriate channels provided on our website.
